topic.title: log_iw_size()
topic.para: Description: The size of the initial window, this value is used during flow control. If the max-connections() option is set, the log_iw_size() will be divided by the number of connections, otherwise log_iw_size() is divided by 10 (the default value of the max-connections() option). The resulting number is the initial window size of each connection.

example.title: Initial window size of a connection
example.para: If log_iw_size(1000) and max-connections(10), then each connection will have an initial window size of 100.
